attributes.action: Tell us the truth about Covid 19 numbers. Not Corona virus numbers.
attributes.additional_details:
Human corona viruses identified the 1960s. 
Coronaviruses that can infect people are:
Common human coronaviruses
229E (alpha coronavirus)
NL63 (alpha coronavirus)
OC43 (beta coronavirus)
HKU1 (beta coronavirus)
Other human coronaviruses
MERS-CoV (the beta coronavirus that causes Middle East Respiratory Syndrome, or MERS)
SARS-CoV (the beta coronavirus that causes severe acute respiratory syndrome, or SARS)
SARS-CoV-2 (the novel coronavirus that causes coronavirus disease 2019, or COVID-19)
attributes.background:
Please stop all missleading reports of Covid 19 under the cloak of "Corona virus" as there is no such virus as "Corona virus" 
There are seven types/groups of "Corona viruses" as listed by the gov own web site CDC. Centers for Deasease Control.
Please report only the pandemic virus, Covid 19

rejection.details:
The Government publishes statistics of the number of individuals who have had at least one lab-confirmed positive COVID-19 test result.

It is up to individual media outlets to decide how to report on the outbreak, although we have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

To create a public inquiry into the media reporting and presenting of the virus: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/318334
